channel.title: IceBlitz! Bringing back Epicurus| Double XP Weekend | Grand Exchange | VPS Hoste
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://eypic.net/images/good.gif[/img]
IceBlitz Navigation
Homepage [URL=http://iceblitz.tk]IceBlitz[/URL]
Webclient [URL=http://impresaweb.wix.com/iceblitz#!playnow/c60z]IceBlitz Webclient[/URL]
Downloads
Mirror 1 [URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/58950841/IceBlitz.jar]Click Here[/URL] Mirror 2 [URL=http://www.undeadsoulspk.heliohost.org/Client/IceBlitz.jar]Click Here[/URL]
Vote [URL=http://impresaweb.wix.com/iceblitz#!vote/c21nl]Click Here[/URL]
IceBlitz is currently 24/7 Uptime ( Vps Hosted )
IceBlitz Owner/Developer : Lucas IceBlitz Moderators : Spots Open - [URL=http://iceblitz.boards.net/index.cgi?board=talk&action=display&thread=4]Click Here[/URL] if you should be moderator of IceBlitz.
Double EXP is enabled for the next week! Join while its activated.
We are currently hosting IceBlitz Eco World. IceBlitz PK World is coming soon.
Features:
Grand Exchange Flawless PK'ing 100% Curses All skills working, flawlessly. New 660+ Items Bank All Bank Equipt Items Collection Bag (Store 2b+ GP) 7 Bosses to explore. 100% Loyalty Titles Customizable Loyalty Titles Over 10 donar crowns to choose from. 100% Pest Control 100% Duel Arena. No Dupes! 100% Staking! TzHaar fight caves + fight pits! Tokkul shop! 100% Party Room!
Media:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LM4Sy7S8saM&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [IMG]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/6359/lastvh.png[/img] [IMG]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/4180/miningx.png[/img] [IMG]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/8753/farmingx.png[/img] [IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/8840/farmingstore.png[/img] [IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/1486/smithingp.png[/img] [IMG]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/4998/woodcuttingl.png[/img] [IMG]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/154/fishingcooking.png[/img] [IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/7084/11487085.png[/img] [IMG]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/9617/77853259.png[/img] [IMG]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/9462/80280405.png[/img] [IMG]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/9352/12087726.png[/img] [IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/2889/39502072.png[/img] [IMG]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/1667/monstersteleports.png[/img] [IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/144/pktelesz.png[/img] [IMG]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/7648/minigamesteleports.png[/img] [IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/4755/bossesteles.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

That banner is… horrid to me, never like those kind of banners. And that custom crown that’s shown in the picture looks even worse though - not bashing on you but still… that is not the best looking crown, and banner. I do wish for the best though and hope things come around the way you want them to. Good luck with the server.
